section.name: Featured technologies
section.p: ObjectLedge is Open Source software, and it is based on numerous Open Source libraries and tools.

subsection.name: Core dependencies
subsection.p: Those are the runtime dependencies of the core components, that are needed to run any ObjectLedge application.

subsection.name: Optional dependencies
subsection.p: Those are the runtime dependencies of non-core components. They are needed to run the application only if it uses the mentioned components. However they are required to compile ObjectLedge codebase.

subsection.name: Tools
subsection.p: We use many excelent Open Source tools for developing ObjectLedge.
